Title: The Conviction
Writer: Marco Bellocchio (screenplay), Marco Bellocchio (story), Massimo Fagioli (screenplay), Massimo Fagioli (story)
Actors: Vittorio Mezzogiorno, Andrzej Seweryn, Claire Nebout, Grazyna Szapolowska
Plot: A girl and her art professor get trapped inside a castle-museum after it closes at night. After a little resistance she agrees to have sex with him, but then she sues the professor for rape. The professor will have to prove his innocence.
